basic.floral_language:
Gardenia jasminoides Ellis
Floriography: cheerful, tough, pure 
Gardenia jasminoides Ellis is flowering so beautiful and so pure. 
Gardenia is the city flower of Yueyang. Leaf blade thick, dark green, clear vein. The flower size is small and flower scent is pleasant. Because of its exquisite appearance and sweet elegant fragrant, is often used as a corsage accessories, bedroom decoration and ornament flower bed. 
Gardenia like mild sunshine, natural flowering from April to July, ornamental period for 2-3 weeks. When flowers are wilted, cut off the withered leaves and flowers, waiting for bloom again next year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-July, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, also resistant to half shade, avoid strong light, when flowering put in the places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
